benchmark_details.name: CliMedBench: A Large-Scale Chinese Benchmark for Evaluating Medical Large Language Models in Clinical Scenarios
benchmark_details.overview: CliMedBench is a comprehensive benchmark with 14 expert-guided core clinical scenarios designed to assess the medical ability of LLMs across seven dimensions, comprising 33,735 questions derived from real-world medical reports of top-tier tertiary hospitals and authentic examination exercises.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of CliMedBench is to provide a standardized evaluation benchmark to scrutinize the capabilities and limitations of medical LLMs.

data.source: The dataset is derived from real-world Electronic Health Records (EHRs) of top-tier tertiary hospitals in China, supplemented with examination exercises and clinical consultation data.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on LLMs' responses to questions in various scenarios.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in clinical reasoning and knowledge application.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated through expert assessments and iterative feedback from medical professionals.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All EHRs were doubly de-identified to ensure patient privacy.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: The project was conducted in collaboration with relevant medical centers with proper approval.
